resources.string: In Who Am I Mode you will be asked a bunch of questions and based on your answers we will tell you which main protagonist you are :)
In Guess Me, you will also be asked questions around a certain figure and you will have to guess it and test your anime knowledge :\')
In meet me, you will see a list of anime characters and their corresponding anime. Maybe you are a hardcore fan and you already know them by heart :)
A lebanese student named Jean-Paul created this app for his university project on December 2019 (The time where Lebanon Revolution began). He was a hardcore anime fan and a developer.
